en.title: FusionExcel Welcomes Quantum Pendant Wearers, Malaysian National Athlete Champions!
en.content:
FusionExcel is proud to host lunch for Quantum Pendant Wearers, Malaysian National Athletes Champions, after their success in the recent Malaysian Games (SUKMA). The athletes at the lunch reported improved performances after wearing FusionExcel's Quantum Pendant  by winning Gold Medals in their respective events (except Patria Pang, who won Silver), with some breaking National records and beating their own Personal Best records!

Quantum Pendant Wearers Yuan Yu Fang (20 km Walk), Elaine Teo (Taekwondo, Under 57 kg) and Che Chew Chan (Taekwondo, Above 65 kg) will be representing Malaysia in the coming 2008 Beijing Olympic Games. FusionExcel wishes them good performance!

Malaysian National Athletes Champions At The Lunch Are:

- Tan Song Hwa (Hammer Throw. Winner SUKMA Gold and National Record Holder).

- Elaine Teo (Taekwondo, Under 57. Winner SUKMA Gold and 2 times Olympian, 2004 Sports Woman of
  the Year, 2004 World TKD Championships Korea Gold, 2005 USA OPEN Gold, 2005 Commonwealth Games
  Australia Gold, 2007 Gold Cup TKD Championships Hong Kong Gold).

- Che Chew Chan (Taekwondo, Over 65 kg. Winner SUKMA Gold and Olympian).

- Patria Pang Wei Chin (Hammer Throw. Winner SUKMA Silver).

- Siti Fatimah (100m and 200m. Winner SUKMA Gold).

- Kathleen Ong (Pole Vault. Winner SUKMA Gold).

- Sin Li Jane (Up and Coming Bowling Champion, 2nd Runner Up Malaysian Open).

- Yuan Yu Fang (3 times Olympian and Winner of SEA Games Gold Medals 20km Walk between 1999 and
  2007).

Also at the lunch was Khoo Chong Beng, 2008 Beijing Olympic Games Referee (Big Walk).
